tweet: Shitcoin  /SHitkoin/  noun: Shitcoin; plural noun: shitcoins  1. A cryptoasset or cryptocurrency that is not Bitcoin.  Synonyms: altcoin, token  E.g.: "Litecoin is a worthless Shitcoin"  origin: from English "shit" (feces) and "coin" (currency)   Related: shitcoiner, shitcoining
